Title: Requires owners of certain large vessels to establish whale strike prevention policies
Summary: Requires owners of certain large vessels to establish whale strike prevention policies; establishes penalties for failure to establish such policies.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 9 §§13-0901 - 13-0909, amd §71-0923, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing whale strike prevention policies for large vessels
